title: $58 NIB delivered: The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Co. ~ 1886-1890
author: SteveMitchell

posts.post_title: $58 NIB delivered: The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Co. ~ 1886-1890
posts.post_content:
SOLD OUT - Thanks to all who helped! If more are ever acquired, we will re-post!

We purchased quite a number (too many for our purposes it turns out) of The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Co. ~ 1886-1890 and will now sell at $58 delivered until our stock is reduced to 10 or fewer. In the past we have sold a couple of dozen at $75 plus $7.75 shipping. 

All are new, never opened in original box.

This is the monumental 459-page, 5-plus pound, hardbound reference work by Jay Miller, Joe Gonsowski & Richard Masson which covers: 

History of Goodwin & Co. ~ 1886 Old Judge Cards ~ Gypsy Queens ~ 1888 Old Judge Cards ~ 1889 Old Judge Cards ~ Old Judge Cabinets ~ Old Judge Production ~ Old Judge Rarities ~ Old Judge Reprints/Reissues ~ Other Goodwin & Co. Baseball Issues ~ Goodwin & Co. Advertising ~ Overview - Old Judge at a Glance ~ Player Biographies

Originally retailing at $125, it is an awesome book. Ours are still sealed in the original box and will be shipped double-boxed to assure fresh, new condition.

For those who may like a copy of another key reference, we also have a few copies of Lew Lipset's ENCYCLOPEDIA of Baseball Cards: 3 Volumes Combined at $35 delivered.

Payment by check, money order or Paypal. Prices are for shipment within the US only. (We will ship foreign but at much higher cost.)

Check or money order payment may be sent to: 

Stephen Mitchell
Post Office Box 6022
Edmonds, Washington 98026

If Paypal is preferred, please use: [url]slm98@comcast.net[/url]

Washington State residents only, please add 8.9% WS tax.

Checks will need to clear; money order/Paypal payment orders will ship within 24 hours of receipt of funds.

Thanks!

Thank you for your order, Brad. Book will ship Saturday morning.

Best regards,
Steve Mitchell

PM sent.


Thanks,
ChiSoxFan

Thank you for your Paypal payment, James. Your book will ship this morning.

Best regards,
Steve
1/27/15

Mike...

Thank you for your second purchase. Shipment was made this morning and we have sent a P/M with tracking info.

Thanks again,
Steve

Steve,

Wonderful book that is filled with history! :) Thanks for the pair and I may even buy more if you have them down the road as gifts! Take care,

Peace, Mike

Thank you, Mike, for your two purchases. We're glad the USPS came through in timely fashion and that you like the book. It really is great!

Steve
bump

Steve,

Just sent payment for the Goodwin book


Thanks,

Albert

Steve,

Paypal payment for the book sent as well. Thanks!

Taylor

Albert and Taylor...

Thank you for your purchases. Your books will be in Wednesday morning's mail.

Best regards,
Steve Mitchell

Thanks For the deal!

Albert

I just wanted to comment on the book. It is GORGEOUS with some incredible information and details, not just on the cards and the company, but on the players as well! Well worth the money.

I feel I got twice the value out of it as my wife spent about an hour looking through it as well. When I told her how much I spent on it (usually not an issue anyway), she said it was well worth it.

Happy wife, happy collecting. Thanks again for making this available! :)

Thank you, Taylor. You (and your wife) are right: this is a high quality book - impressive in terms of both information quality and a well constructed tome, too. Even collectors like myself, who have few 19th century cards, can gain much from studying it. Thanks for taking the time to give your impressions.

For any others, we still have several books to sell at $58 delivered. Payment by Paypal or check/money order is fine.

Steve Mitchell
P.O. Box 6022
Edmonds, WA 98026

Paypal ID: [url]slm98@comcast.net[/url]
Got the book. Many thanks

Daryle:

Thanks for letting me know your book arrived A-OK. Have a great weekend!

Best regards,
Steve
